alert.note: Alert for Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 03 at 1:14PM MDT until September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT SUNDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Sunday. the Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Unseasonably Hot Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior with new fire starts possible. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zone 283. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont. * WIND: Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the mid 90s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
